Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Constructors
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    rx.schedulers.ImmediateScheduler
    This type was never publicly instantiable. Use Schedulers.immediate().
    rx.schedulers.NewThreadScheduler
    This type was never publicly instantiable. Use Schedulers.newThread().
    rx.observers.TestObserver
    use the TestSubscriber instead.
    rx.schedulers.TrampolineScheduler
    This type was never publicly instantiable. Use Schedulers.trampoline().
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    rx.Observable.cache(int)
    Use Observable.cacheWithInitialCapacity(int) instead.
    rx.Observable.create(Observable.OnSubscribe)
    1.2.7 - inherently unsafe, use the other create() methods for basic cases or see Observable.unsafeCreate(OnSubscribe) for advanced cases (such as custom operators)
    rx.Notification.createOnCompleted(Class)
    this method does the same as Notification.createOnCompleted() and does not use the passed in type hence it's useless.
    rx.Observable.finallyDo(Action0)
    use Observable.doAfterTerminate(Action0) instead.
    rx.Observable.fromEmitter(Action1>, Emitter.BackpressureMode)
    1.2.7 - aliased to Observable.create(Action1, rx.Emitter.BackpressureMode), will be removed in 1.3.0
    rx.plugins.RxJavaPlugins.getInstance()
    use the static methods of RxJavaHooks.
    rx.observers.TestSubscriber.getOnCompletedEvents()
    use TestSubscriber.getCompletions() instead.
    rx.plugins.RxJavaErrorHandler.handleError(Throwable)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaCompletableExecutionHook.onCreate(Completable.OnSubscribe)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaObservableExecutionHook.onCreate(Observable.OnSubscribe)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSingleExecutionHook.onCreate(Single.OnSubscribe)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaCompletableExecutionHook.onLift(Completable.Operator)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaObservableExecutionHook.onLift(Observable.Operator)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSingleExecutionHook.onLift(Observable.Operator)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSchedulersHook.onSchedule(Action0)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaCompletableExecutionHook.onSubscribeError(Throwable)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaObservableExecutionHook.onSubscribeError(Throwable)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSingleExecutionHook.onSubscribeError(Throwable)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaObservableExecutionHook.onSubscribeReturn(Subscription)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSingleExecutionHook.onSubscribeReturn(Subscription)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaCompletableExecutionHook.onSubscribeStart(Completable, Completable.OnSubscribe)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaObservableExecutionHook.onSubscribeStart(Observable, Observable.OnSubscribe)
    rx.plugins.RxJavaSingleExecutionHook.onSubscribeStart(Single, Observable.OnSubscribe)
    rx.Observable.timer(long, long, TimeUnit)
    use Observable.interval(long, long, TimeUnit) instead
    rx.Observable.timer(long, long, TimeUnit, Scheduler)
    use Observable.interval(long, long, TimeUnit, Scheduler) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    rx.exceptions.CompositeException(String, Collection)
    please use CompositeException.CompositeException(Collection)
    rx.Single(Observable.OnSubscribe)
    1.2.1: Not recommended, use Single.Single(OnSubscribe) to avoid wrapping and conversion between the Observable and Single protocols.
